name: Rocket Racers
description:
This game was made by Cohen Berg with his father Mike (@weheartgames) to learn game development. All artwork and game design by Cohen.

Videos of the process of development of Rocket Racers can be found here.

FEATURES:

  • Multiple unlockable costumes, each with their own movement speed.
  • High score.

Anything you can give to support young game developers is much appreciated!

Available for Mac only at the moment.
